slides.title: Ratio and Proportion
slides.content:
**Ratio:** Comparison of two quantities (a:b)
**Proportion:** Equality of ratios (a:b = c:d)
**Unitary Method:** Find value of 1 unit, then find required
**Direct:** More of one → More of other
**Inverse:** More of one → Less of other

slides.title: Solving Problems
slides.content:
**Simplify Ratio:** Divide by HCF
**Finding Parts:** If ratio a:b and total is T, first part = (a/(a+b))×T
**Cross Multiplication:** If a:b = c:d, then a×d = b×c
